alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Waupaca, northwestern Outagamie and Shawano Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of Amherst, or 16 miles north of Waupaca, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New London, Clintonville, Black Creek, Embarrass, Manawa, Iola, Marion, Shiocton, Bear Creek and Navarino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
